data.text:
Hi @gillianoberholzer 

if we make this change then i will have to enforce a per month period only.
With the requested change as is, anybody can pull a report for ALL Courts and for a huge date period which will affect performance tremendously.

If i we make the change then a ALL Courts option will display on every court drop down in Report Central as well which means we must amend all court reports where it uses a datefrom/dateto option.

the other option will be to split up the Court Lookup to a normal Court Lookup and one that includes a ALL Courts option. every report that uses it will have to be amended to limit the date range.

please confirm what we should do.

card.name: CW - CCW222 - Add All Courts option
